alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:24PM EDT until July 13 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Gallia County in southeastern Ohio... Northeastern Lawrence County in southeastern Ohio... Southwestern Mason County in western West Virginia... Northeastern Cabell County in central West Virginia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Lake Vesuvius, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Waterloo, Crown City, Henderson, Gallopolis Ferry and Ashton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
